info.name: Kinship API v1 - Complete
info.description:
Complete API collection for Kinship React Dashboards

**Phase 1: Authentication** ✅
**Phase 2: Core Serializers** ✅
**Phase 3: User Dashboard** ✅
**Phase 4: Teacher Dashboard** ✅
**Phase 5: School Dashboard** ✅
**Phase 6: Company Dashboard** ✅

**How to use:**
1. Run 'Login' request first
2. Token will be auto-saved to {{jwt_token}} variable
3. All other requests use this token automatically

**Authentication Flow:**
- Login → Get JWT token (24h expiration)
- Use token for all subsequent requests
- Refresh token when needed

item.name: School Dashboard

body.raw:
{
  "partnership_type": "bilateral",
  "name": "School-Company Partnership",
  "description": "Collaborative partnership for student projects",
  "partner_company_ids": [1],
  "partner_school_ids": [],
  "share_members": false,
  "share_projects": true,
  "has_sponsorship": false,
  "initiator_role": "beneficiary",
  "partner_role": "sponsor"
}

item.description: School Dashboard API endpoints (Phase 5) - Admin/Superadmin only access
